script.source: doc["package.name.raw"].value.equals(params.text) ? 100000 + (doc["score.detail.popularity"].value * params.popularityWeight + doc["score.detail.quality"].value * params.qualityWeight + doc["score.detail.maintenance"].value * params.maintenanceWeight) : _score * Math.pow((doc["score.detail.popularity"].value * params.popularityWeight + doc["score.detail.quality"].value * params.qualityWeight + doc["score.detail.maintenance"].value * params.maintenanceWeight), params.scoreEffect)
